Material Description: Diluent (5PDA) - Sample dilution, rinsing and sheath formation
FBH Lyse - Dissolve RBCs, platelets, combined with hemoglobin and remove cell membrane of WBCs (exclude basophil)
FDOI Lyse - Staining of WBCs and firming reagent
FDTI Lyse - Dissolve RBCs and specialize different types of WBCs
